pages.text: $(li)Stradpoles are tiny passive creatures that live in the lava of the Nether, but they can also live in water too.$(br)$(li)You can transport them using a $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/lava_bucket)Lava Bucket$(/l).$(br)$(li)If you feed one with a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/crimson_mosquito_larva)Crimson Mosquito Larva$(/l), it will grow up into an adult $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/straddler)Straddler$(/l).
When $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/straddler)Straddler$(/l) hits you with a throwed Stradpole, you take 1.5 damage, and it disappears after a few seconds.
